name: Fantasmagorie
description:
What do you dream of?

Enter the mind of a struggling writer in this short (approx. 10 minutes long) game tackling the idea of what it means to create. Face your anxiety and uncertainty surrounding the future, past, and own identity.

What do you dream about?

Stumble through the scenes paved by subconsciousness as opposed to logic. Talk, think, feel, and most importantly, wake up. This journey is not about the destination.

This journey simply is, and so are you.
